action.action-desc: Mr. Schmidt introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to direct State Medicaid fraud control units to investigate and prosecute instances of beneficiary fraud.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the States Taking On Power For Redressing All Unlawful Deceits in Medicaid Act or the STOP FRAUD in Medicaid Act.

section.header: Directing State Medicaid fraud control units to investigate and prosecute beneficiary fraud
